title: Software Engineer
description: Tutor for the software development course for minor students.

title: Tutor/Student assistant
description:
- Led tutorials in **Java** and **Haskell** for 35+ students, applying theory to hands-on coding.
- Guided teams in **Python** software labs, focusing on debugging and best practices.
- Supported students with preparation, conceptual guidance, and one-on-one mentoring.
- Supervised and graded semester exams.
- Reviewed team projects and coursework, giving feedback on both code and collaboration.
